text: Saioni rankumapinti'ma knare musenkema huama'ma nehana vahe'moka, agonarega marerinka kagerura erisga hunka hankavetinka ana musenkea huama huo. Jerusalemi rankumapima mani'neta musenkema huama'ma nehaza vahe'mota, korora osutma kezatitma, Juda mopafima me'nea rankumatmimpima nemaniza vahera tamagri Anumzana ama'nagi keho hutma zamasamiho!
